main event: An observer reported sighting a large object resembling a conventional aircraft in Shepherdsville, Kentucky, on July 1, 1968.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10 to 15 seconds,The observer described the object as very large,The exact details of the object were unclear,No photographs were included with the report,The object was surrounded by a bluish glow and displayed varying speeds and altitudes.
sighted object: a very large object resembling a conventional aircraft
